snippet: Facebook’s public offering will make a lot of billionaires and millionaires, some of them prominent people and others not.
abstract: Facebook’s initial public offering will make a lot of billionaires and millionaires, some of them prominent people and others not; $5 billion offering is expected to value the company at $75 billion to $100 billion; during the firm's early years, it granted valuable options to about 250 employees, which includes some of the largest stock packages.

byline.original: By NICK BILTON and EVELYN M. RUSLI
byline.contributor: Nick Bilton reported from San Francisco and Evelyn M. Rusli from New York.

lead_paragraph: Facebook’s public offering will make a lot of billionaires and millionaires, some of them prominent people and others not.

headline.seo: For Founders to Decorators, Facebook Riches
headline.main: From Founders to Decorators, Facebook Riches
headline.print_headline: From Founders to Decorators, Facebook Riches
